column5: LTBR

LTBR the golden cross now in effect this is either gonna explode or dump in our faces given its LTBR prepare for the latter but Im buying dips
LTBR hi all can someone kindly discuss revenue potential and timetable for sales Thinking of opening a long position

LTBR Not sure how Bradley moving to Framatone and Donweck becoming CFO at the JV makes a difference I would imagine this appears to be kind of a promotion for BradleyI have seen a lot of companies give promotions to execs just to phase them out Is this what is happening with Bradley Are they moving him to an area where it is just a title and eventually he will be given the ax
LTBR Now blocking jimmienoman or whoever he is Like to his his kindergarten report card
LTBR lolas an ER doc change in CFO wouldnt have meant much to megreatly appreciate all the business acumen on this board
LTBR First short to panic wins Be afraid

LTBR hey you long termers Is it sad Im pumping the brakes on this because knowing Seths personality this may just be a scheme of his I mean he may be thinking to himself Hey we are going to get this huge grant and utility contracts any moment now whats the first thing we should do I know well need a Great CFO when that happens So he goes and hires a new CFO expecting his timeline will come to fruition in months In reality the timeline is years
LTBR Imagine Framatome can almost have their pick of CFOs BOLD and thoughtful move Both CFO positions will pay long term dividends

LTBR Sit back and imagine how long and what discussions took place for a CFO change Huge Confidence shown on both sides of the JV This might be better than the StarbucksPepsi very successful JVNobody moves CFOs about without great strategic meaning Sure they dismiss a few but this is rarefied waters Long term success here It has been written
LTBR Great subtle move Maybe I can end my 97 rant MaybeDont see that symbiosis very often
